source.f1b767da: Understanding Machine Learning Models Better with Explainable AI
source.f8f7bd27: ExplainerDashboard is a library for quickly building interactive dashboards for analyzing and explaining the predictions and workings of (scikit-learn compatible) machine learning models, including xgboost, catboost and lightgbm. This makes your model transparant and explainable with just two lines of code.
